publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2676 Mr Keith Harding: Freemasons-That the Parliament notes the declaration of Mr Keith Harding MSP as a Freemason in the register of members' interests on 31 January 2002 and encourages all other MSPs who are members of the craft, a body of men dedicated to charitable good works, to make similar voluntary declarations in support of the Consultative Steering Group's principles of openness, accountability and transparency. Supported by: Mr David Davidson*

S1M-2676 Mr Keith Harding: Freemasons-That the Parliament notes the declaration of Mr Keith Harding MSP as a Freemason in the register of members' interests on 31 January 2002 and encourages all other MSPs who are members of the craft, a body of men dedicated to charitable good works, to make similar voluntary declarations in support of the Consultative Steering Group's principles of openness, accountability and transparency. Supported by: Mr David Davidson, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-2676 Freemasons (lodged on 31 January 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Murdo Fraser*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2676 Freemasons (lodged on 31 January 2002) Iain Smith*
S1M-2676 Freemasons (lodged on 31 January 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2676 Freemasons (lodged on 31 January 2002) Michael Russell*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2676 Freemasons (lodged on 31 January 2002) Tricia Marwick*
